SELECT B.GROUP1_SEQ, B.GROUP2_SEQ, B.GROUP3_SEQ, B.SYSTEM_SEQ, B.GROUP1_NAME, B.GROUP2_NAME, B.GROUP3_NAME, B.SYSTEM_NAME,
B.EQUIPMENT_SEQ, B.EQUIPMENT_NAME, PE.WORK_GUBUN, A.STATUS, S.STATUS2, COUNT(*) COUNT
NPC.NEW_PNCR_GUBUN, COUNT(DISTINCT(NPC.NEW_PN_CR_SEQ)) COUNT
FROM PKMS.PKG_EQUIPMENT PE, PKMS.PKG_MASTER A, (SELECT G1.GROUP1_SEQ, G1.NAME GROUP1_NAME, G2.GROUP2_SEQ, G2.NAME GROUP2_NAME, G3.GROUP3_SEQ, G3.NAME GROUP3_NAME, S.SYSTEM_SEQ, S.NAME SYSTEM_NAME, E.EQUIPMENT_SEQ, E.NAME EQUIPMENT_NAME, S.BP_NUM, S.BP_NUM1, S.BP_NUM2, S.BP_NUM3, S.BP_NUM4 FROM PKMS.GROUP1 G1, PKMS.GROUP2 G2, PKMS.GROUP3 G3, PKMS.SYSTEM S, PKMS.EQUIPMENT E WHERE G1.GROUP1_SEQ = G2.GROUP1_SEQ AND G2.GROUP2_SEQ = G3.GROUP2_SEQ AND G3.GROUP3_SEQ = S.GROUP3_SEQ AND S.SYSTEM_SEQ = E.SYSTEM_SEQ AND G1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND G2.USE_YN = 'Y' AND G3.USE_YN = 'Y' AND S.USE_YN = 'Y' AND E.USE_YN = 'Y' ) B, PKMS.COMMON_CODE C, PKMS.BP_USER D, PKMS.INF_PERSON_INFO_RCV E
,(SELECT PKG_SEQ, MAX(STATUS) STATUS2 FROM PKG_STATUS GROUP BY PKG_SEQ) S
,PKMS.PKG_DETAIL PD, PKMS.NEW_PN_CR NPC
WHERE A.SYSTEM_SEQ = B.SYSTEM_SEQ(+) AND PE.EQUIPMENT_SEQ = B.EQUIPMENT_SEQ AND A.PKG_SEQ = PE.PKG_SEQ
A.PKG_SEQ = S.PKG_SEQ
A.PKG_SEQ = PD.PKG_SEQ AND PD.NEW_PN_CR_SEQ = NPC.NEW_PN_CR_SEQ
((SELECT count(1) FROM PKMS.SYSTEM_USER SU WHERE B.SYSTEM_SEQ = SU.SYSTEM_SEQ(+) AND SU.USER_GUBUN = 'M' AND SU.USER_ID = #session_user_id#) + (SELECT count(1) FROM PKMS.EQUIPMENT PE, PKMS.EQUIPMENT_USER EU WHERE B.SYSTEM_SEQ = PE.SYSTEM_SEQ(+) AND PE.EQUIPMENT_SEQ = EU.EQUIPMENT_SEQ(+) AND EU.USER_ID = #session_user_id#)) > 0
(SELECT count(1) FROM PKMS.SYSTEM_USER SU WHERE B.SYSTEM_SEQ = SU.SYSTEM_SEQ(+) AND SU.USER_GUBUN = 'B' AND SU.USER_ID = #session_user_id#) > 0
((SELECT count(1) FROM PKMS.BP_MASTER BM WHERE B.BP_NUM = BM.BP_NUM(+) AND BM.BP_NUM = #session_user_group_id#) + (SELECT count(1) FROM PKMS.BP_MASTER BM WHERE B.BP_NUM1 = BM.BP_NUM(+) AND BM.BP_NUM = #session_user_group_id#) + (SELECT count(1) FROM PKMS.BP_MASTER BM WHERE B.BP_NUM2 = BM.BP_NUM(+) AND BM.BP_NUM = #session_user_group_id#) + (SELECT count(1) FROM PKMS.BP_MASTER BM WHERE B.BP_NUM3 = BM.BP_NUM(+) AND BM.BP_NUM = #session_user_group_id#) + (SELECT count(1) FROM PKMS.BP_MASTER BM WHERE B.BP_NUM4 = BM.BP_NUM(+) AND BM.BP_NUM = #session_user_group_id#) ) > 0
AND A.STATUS = C.COMMON_CODE(+) AND A.REG_USER = D.BP_USER_ID(+) AND A.REG_USER = E.EMPNO(+) AND C.GUBUN = 'PKS' AND PE.WORK_DATE >= TO_DATE(#start_date#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PE.WORK_DATE <= TO_DATE(#end_date#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY B.GROUP1_SEQ, B.GROUP2_SEQ, B.GROUP3_SEQ, B.SYSTEM_SEQ, B.GROUP1_NAME, B.GROUP2_NAME, B.GROUP3_NAME, B.SYSTEM_NAME
,B.EQUIPMENT_SEQ, B.EQUIPMENT_NAME, PE.WORK_GUBUN, A.STATUS, S.STATUS2
,NPC.NEW_PNCR_GUBUN
